required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Specified Drug-Use Survey of Leuprorelin Acetate Injection Kit 11.25 mg "All-Case Investigation: Spinal and Bulbar Muscular Atrophy (SBMA)"
clinical_study.official_title: Specified Drug-Use Survey of Leuprorelin Acetate Injection Kit 11.25 mg "All-Case Investigation: Spinal and Bulbar Muscular Atrophy (SBMA)"

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this survey is to evaluate the long-term safety and efficacy of leuprorelin acetate injection kit 11.25 mg in patients with spinal and bulbar muscular atrophy (SBMA) in the routine clinical setting.

detailed_description.textblock:
The drug being tested in this survey is called leuprorelin acetate injection kit 11.25 mg. This injection kit is being tested to treat people who have SBMA.
This survey is an observational (non-interventional) study and will look at the long-term safety and efficacy of the leuprorelin acetate injection kit 11.25 mg in the routine clinical setting. The planned number of observed patients will be approximately 300.
This multi-center observational trial will be conducted in Japan.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants who had One or More Adverse Drug Reactions
primary_outcome.description: Adverse drug reaction refers to adverse events related to administered drug. Percentage of participants who have the adverse drug reactions that occurred between initiation of treatment with the drug and 1 year after the start of treatment with the drug (or 3 months after the last dose of the drug if the treatment was discontinued within the first four doses) will be reported.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants who had One or More Serious Adverse Events
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants who have the serious adverse events that occurred between initiation of treatment with the drug and 1 year after the start of treatment with the drug (or 3 months after the last dose of the drug if the treatment was discontinued within the first four doses) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants without Death Event
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At final assessment point (up to 8 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants without events of death at final assessment point (up to 8 years from initiation of treatment) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants without Pneumonia Requiring Hospitalization Event
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At final assessment point (up to 8 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants without events of pneumonia requiring hospitalization at final assessment point (up to 8 years from initiation of treatment) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants without Composite Events of Death and Pneumonia Requiring Hospitalization
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At final assessment point (up to 8 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants without composite events of death and pneumonia requiring hospitalization at final assessment point (up to 8 years from initiation of treatment) will be reported.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants without Dysphagia Events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At final assessment point (up to 8 years)
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants without events of dysphagia at final assessment point (up to 8 years from initiation of treatment) will be reported.

arm_group.description: Leuprorelin Acetate Injection Kit 11.25 mg, every 12 weeks subcutaneously, for up to at most 8 years. Participants received interventions as part of routine medical care.

intervention.other_name: Leuplin SR for Injection Kit 11.25 mg

study_pop.textblock: SBMA patients treated with Leuprorelin Acetate Injection Kit 11.25 mg as part of routine medical care

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- All SBMA patients who have been confirmed as receiving the drug
Exclusion Criteria:
- None
